page.title: 15Somerset Brownies,Exford
page.content: Every Tuesday I go to Brownies at Timberscombe.Our pack is called the First Timberscombe Pack. On Saturday we are doing a gang show at the West Somerset school, to celebrate 75 years of Guiding. Our theme is the English weather. In June we had "It's a knockout" at Horner. At Brownies we play a selection of games like "Isn't it funny how bears like honey?", "Noah's ark","Fishes" and "Baked Beans".Every year we go on pack holiday. This year I'm going to camp at Dulverton Middle School. I hope that I get a lot of badges this year. I have already got 6 . I hope alot more girls join Brownies. It is very enjoyable.
